en.only_support_letter_number_underscore_da: Supports upper and lower case letters, numbers, underscores, and dash
en.snapshot_mgmt_module_content: Snapshot management is to save the state of the storage disk at a certain moment, and uses the multiple technologies such as copy-on-write to create and roll back the second-level snapshots. At the same time, the snapshots are managed using the chained timeline. The snapshots are mutually independent and do not affect each other after deleted.
en.sure_to_flatten: Are you sure you want to disconnect the parent snapshot from all its child volumes?
en.sure_to_open_snapshot_protection: Are you sure you want to turn on snapshot protection?
en.sure_to_open_snapshot_protection_tip: Turn on the snapshot protection. To delete the snapshot, you must turn off protection first.
en.sure_to_close_snapshot_protection: Are you sure you want to turn off snapshot protection?
en.sure_to_close_snapshot_protection_tip: This snapshot has child cloned volumes, please flatten first, click
en.cannot_create_clone_volume_tip: This snapshot is not protected and cannot create a cloned volume, please protect the snapshot first. Click
en.sure_to_delete_snapshot: Are you sure you want to delete this snapshot?
en.sure_to_delete_snapshot_tip: This snapshot is protected, please turn off the snapshot protection, click

zh-CN.only_support_letter_number_underscore_da: 支持大小写字母、数字、下划线和中划线
zh-CN.snapshot_mgmt_module_content: 快照管理是保存存储盘在某一时刻的状态，利用写时复制等多项技术实现了秒级快照创建和回滚，同时采用链式时间轴管理快照，快照之间相互独立，删除后互不影响。
zh-CN.sure_to_open_snapshot_protection_tip: 即将开启快照保护，如需删除快照，必须先关闭保护。
zh-CN.sure_to_flatten: 确认需要断开该父快照与其所有子卷的关联关系？
zh-CN.sure_to_close_snapshot_protection_tip: 此快照拥有子克隆卷，请先进行断链，点击
zh-CN.cannot_create_clone_volume_tip: 此快照未被保护无法创建克隆卷，请先保护快照，点击
zh-CN.sure_to_delete_snapshot_tip: 此快照被保护，请先关闭快照保护，点击
